content: The Indianapolis Colts offense, led by quarterback Daniel Jones, is performing at a high level, ranking first in the NFL in total points and second in total yards after seven weeks. Jones is averaging a career-high 255.7 passing yards per game and is projected for 263 yards in Week 8 against the Tennessee Titans. The SportsLine Machine Learning Model identifies Jones Over 233.5 passing yards as a top player prop bet for the upcoming game. The model also favors Alvin Kamara of the New Orleans Saints Over 43.5 rushing yards due to a recent injury to backup running back Kendre Miller. Additionally, Drake London of the Atlanta Falcons Over 63.5 receiving yards is highlighted, citing his consistent high target volume and the Dolphins' vulnerable pass defense. These projections are based on the model's AI analysis and consider recent game performance, injury reports, and opponent matchups.
